com.ooyala.cast

Class CastManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.cast.CastManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ooyala.android.CastManagerInterface

    public class CastManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ooyala.android.CastManagerInterface
    CastManager is singleton. It provides enter point for working with cast features.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                              java.lang.String NAMESPACE)
                       throws CastManager.CastManagerInitializationException
        Set up the CastManager singleton.
        Parameters:
        context - an Android context. Non-null.
        NAMESPACE - the name of namespace for custom event bus
        Throws:
        CastManager.CastManagerInitializationException - if initialization fails.

        the CastManager singleton. Possibly null.

      • setAdditionalInitParams

        public void setAdditionalInitParams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Provide key-value pairs that will be passed to the Receiver upon Cast Playback. Anything added to this will overwrite anything set by default in the init.
        Parameters:
        params - the set of key/values that will be added to the Receiver on Init

        public void destroy()

        Returns:
        the currently associated View. Possibly null.

        the view that is displayed during Cast playback

      • hideCastView

        public void hideCastView()
        Removes viewWeakReference from the OoyalaPlayer, for use after disconnecting from the receiver.

      • isConnectedToReceiverApp

        public boolean isConnectedToReceiverApp()
        Specified by:
        isConnectedToReceiverApp in interface com.ooyala.android.CastManagerInterface
        Returns:
        true if the CastManager is connected to a receiver app (e.g. on a networked Chromecast box), even if casting has not actually begun.

      • getCastPlayer

        public com.ooyala.android.player.PlayerInterface getCastPlayer()
        For interacting with the cast playback, even when there is no OoyalaPlayer.
        Specified by:
        getCastPlayer in interface com.ooyala.android.CastManagerInterface
        Returns:
        the current CastPlayer. Possibly null.

      • registerWithOoyalaPlayer

        public void registerWithOoyalaPlayer(com.ooyala.android.OoyalaPlayer ooyalaPlayer)
        Connect the CastManager to the OoyalaPlayer instance. Must be called before setting the embed code of the video asset on the OoyalaPlayer instance.
        Specified by:
        registerWithOoyalaPlayer in interface com.ooyala.android.CastManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        ooyalaPlayer - must not be null.
        See Also:
        deregisterFromOoyalaPlayer()

        Parameters:

      • onApplicationDisconnect

        public void onApplicationDisconnect(com.google.android.gms.cast.framework.CastSession castSession)

        castSession - current session which is disconnected

      • getDeviceName

        public java.lang.String getDeviceName()

      • deregisterFromOoyalaPlayer

        public void deregisterFromOoyalaPlayer()
        Disconnect the currently registered OoyalaPlayer from the OOCastManager. The Android Activity making use of Ooyala Casting should call this appropriately e.g. during its own tear-down.
        See Also:
        registerWithOoyalaPlayer(com.ooyala.android.OoyalaPlayer)
